title: 6-year-old suffers serious injuries after being hit by SUV in Hoover
text:
Published By: Al.com: Birmingham - Today 
A 6-year-old child suffered "significant" injuries Sunday afternoon after being struck by a SUV near the Village on Lorna shopping center in...
